data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 2, Villarreal advance rapidly upfield but Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea blows for offside.
Ball safe as Cadiz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Cadiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 5, Important block from the Cadiz defence as Francis Coquelin fires in a strike for Villarreal.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Free kick Cadiz.
In the minute 6, Mario Gaspar (Villarreal) has received a first yellow card.
Cadiz push upfield but Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea quickly pulls them for offside.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Cadiz a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Cadiz.
Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Villarreal have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Villarreal capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Cadiz throw-in in Villarreal's half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Cadiz.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
Villarreal are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Cadiz to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Throw-in for Cadiz at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
In the minute 26, Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Cadiz.
In the minute 27, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Throw-in Cadiz.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Cadiz's Anthony Lozano gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 32, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Villarreal close to the penalty box.
Cadiz's Salvi Sanchez has been booked in Cadiz.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Cadiz at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Cadiz.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 39, Ball safe as Cadiz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cadiz.
In Cadiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 43, Villarreal needs to be cautious. Cadiz have an attacking throw-in.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Villarreal close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Villarreal to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Cadiz, Villarreal push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Cadiz's Jose Mari misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 48, Cadiz have a goal kick.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
In Cadiz, Paco Alcacer of Villarreal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 52, Villarreal are coming forward and Manu Trigueros gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Villarreal throw-in in Cadiz's half.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards the away team a throw-in.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Free kick Villarreal.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Villarreal.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a throw-in for Cadiz, close to Villarreal's area.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Free kick for Villarreal in the half of Cadiz.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
In the minute 61, Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team have replaced Takefusa Kubo with Samuel Chukwueze. This is the first substitution made today by Unai Emery.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cadiz.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Cadiz throw-in in Villarreal's half.
In the minute 66, Villarreal to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
Filip Malbasic is replacing Alvaro Negredo for the home team.
Jairo Izquierdo is on a sub for Anthony Lozano for Cadiz.
In the minute 69, Villarreal are pushing forward but Mario Gaspar's finish is wide of the goal.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 70, Can Cadiz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
Can Cadiz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Villarreal's half?
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, Carlos Bacca is replacing Manu Trigueros for Villarreal at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Villarreal.
Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cadiz to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
In the minute 80, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Villarreal.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Villarreal throw-in in Cadiz's half.
Free kick Villarreal.
Paco Alcacer for Villarreal drives towards goal at Estadio Ramon de Carranza. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 82, Cadiz make their third substitution with Nano replacing Jose Mari.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
In the minute 83, Villarreal's Carlos Bacca gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Ramon de Carranza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Villarreal at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Can Cadiz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Cadiz to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
In the minute 86, Unai Emery (Villarreal) is making a third substitution, with Juan Foyth replacing Paco Alcacer.
The away team replace Mario Gaspar with Yeremi Pino.
Ruben Pena is replacing Francis Coquelin for the away team.
In the minute 87, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
Alvaro Cervera is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Ramon de Carranza with Alberto Perea replacing Salvi Sanchez.
In Cadiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Villarreal.
Throw-in high up the field for Cadiz in Cadiz.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
Alfonso Pedraza for Villarreal has been booked by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea and receives a first yellow card.
Jairo Izquierdo (Cadiz) has received a yellow card from Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
